data.meta_description: I Want Candy Lyrics by Brian Poole, The Tremeloes. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
look here baby what you tryin' to do the sun's showin' up and honey so are you you walk into the room like everything is fine and when i ask you where you been girl you hand me some old line i told you that i love you now you're trying to change my mind seam in your stockings girl it's out of place you can't hide that look that's on your face i know i got it bad girl but that don't mean i'm blind i ain't no detective but i can read the sign i told you that i love you now you're trying to change my mind come here baby look me in the eye and then tell me where you been all night you want to hurt me you know you did this time i told you that i love you now you're trying to change my mind i told you that i love you now you're trying to change my mind sonyatv tree music publishing Writer(s): BOB FELDMAN, BERT BERNS, RICHARD GOTTEHRER, GERALD GOLDSTEIN
